public class NLSRuntimeException
extends RuntimeException
This class represents an exception has occurred in Oracle NLS runtime library.

NLSRuntimeException(String)
Creates a new NLSRuntimeException with the specified detail message

  public NLSRuntimeException(String s)
Creates a new NLSRuntimeException with the specified detail message
